Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> Just now, The Raging Sandwich said:
> 
> 
> living in Siberia (I'm assuming)
> 

Kamchatka is not Siberia.  

But still has mammoths.
Oh, right. Didn't look at the location.

> 
> 
> Just now, The Raging Sandwich said:
> 
> 
> Oh, right. Didn't look at the location.
> 

It is a wonderful place..At least for me!!
This here hill is mine, and this triangular sign...

> 
> 
> 17 hours ago, The Raging Sandwich said:
> 
> 
> I snag the cookie and run off to my super-duper-secret-hiding-place-of-super-duper-secrecy in a super-duper-secret-location-of-super-duper-secrecy.
> 

I don't think a location of "prepare your anus" is appropriate... T\_T

![7A81183D96AB5D34987F82125887BA4B3B009FA3](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/487892961333069682/7A81183D96AB5D34987F82125887BA4B3B009FA3/)

I soak the hill in propane. The hill is now mine.

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, TheKorbinger said:
> 
> 
> I don't think a location of "prepare your anus" is appropriate... T\_T
> 

I was just waiting for someone to tell me that. Better ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif ":rolleyes:")

> 
> 
> 32 minutes ago, The Raging Sandwich said:
> 
> 
> I was just waiting for someone to tell me that. Better ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif ":rolleyes:")
> 

Nice
mine
No, MINE!
<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2dTh3iI0is8?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

But that was actually Robbie in disguise, who is allied with me!

My Hill.
NO!!! ITS MY HILL!!! I ALREADY SAID THIS!!! DO I HAVE TO THROW A TANTRUM????? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

You all are joking.

Benny's hill  

Spoiler

![002856933.jpg](http://www.spun.com/scover/full/002/856/002856933.jpg)
Mmm... You're right... It is Benny's hill. We were all wrong!

I take it.

My hill.
Now you are the new Benny of the Hill.
Yes

I kick everyone off and takemy hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-23T13:11:37Z" title="02/23/2017 01:11  PM" data-short="7 yr">February 23, 2017</time> by munlander1**

I go to an alternate dimension where no one cares about the hill, and I take it so that [@munlander1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/168560-munlander1/) can keep his war-damaged hill.

My brand-new hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-23T16:17:56Z" title="02/23/2017 04:17  PM" data-short="7 yr">February 23, 2017</time> by TopHeavy11**

You seed caring-about-hills in the new parallel, and your cohabitants take it from you.

People's Hill.

I convert the democracy to a dictatorship with me as the dictator.

MY hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-23T16:22:50Z" title="02/23/2017 04:22  PM" data-short="7 yr">February 23, 2017</time> by TopHeavy11**

There is a revolution of the people living under the hill. 

The people's hill.

> 
> 
> On 21/2/2017 at 11:22 PM, greenTurtle1134 said:
> 
> 
> [@Nailed it!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/162067-nailed-it/) destroyed your world by importing the galactic core supernova from Larry Niven's Known Space, no? Then they started a bandersnatch colony, after which they began fighting over software and cookies.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Speaking of bandersnatchi, I genetically modify a bacterium to infect and kill bandersnatchi. I'm not *evil*, however, so I immediately destroy all samples and store the DNA code ingrained on a piece of glass I then keep in my pocket, encrypted with a password that only I know. However, I do have this as backup against the Bandersnatchi.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My somewhat shared hill.
> 

Good luck storing Bandersnatch DNA, they are like a long armed arm long.

Yes, I destroyed the world thanks to the galactic core supernova from Larry Niven's Known Space, so I move the colony of Spacetraindriver to the Fleet of Worlds, a pentagonal shaped fleet made of planets, fleeing from the core's explosion. Eventually, the Fleet leaves the galaxy, an the radiation that destroys it, and we live happily in a globular cluster, were we find that Bandersnatch already arrived there, so we colonize the globular cluster and we claim it our own.

Our globular cluster.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-23T20:34:41Z" title="02/23/2017 08:34  PM" data-short="7 yr">February 23, 2017</time> by Nailed it!**

The people rebel. 

The people's globular cluster.
